languages.text: {n}Кормчий задумчиво шкребет пальцами по затылку.{/n} "Черт его знает, Лорд-капитан. Как по мне, в сравнении с порядками на других кораблях здешние сиротки как сыр в масле катаются".
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."
languages.original_text: {n}Кормчий задумчиво шкребет пальцами по затылку.{/n} "Черт его знает, Лорд-капитан. Как по мне, в сравнении с порядками на других кораблях здешние сиротки как сыр в масле катаются".

traits.locale_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I knew, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans are living the high life compared to what they'd get on other ships."
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I knew, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans are living the high life compared to what they'd get on other ships."
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."
{n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

languages.text: {n}Le timonier se gratte l'arrière du crâne d'un air pensif.{/n} « J'en sais rien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Si vous voulez mon avis, nos orphelins sont bien mieux lotis que s'ils avaient été à bord d'autres vaisseaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le timonier se gratte l'arrière du crâne d'un air pensif.{/n} « J'en sais rien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Si vous voulez mon avis, les orphelins mènent la grande vie ici, comparé à ce qu'ils auraient sur d'autres vaisseaux. »

languages.text: {n}El timonel se rasca la nuca, sumido en sus pensamientos.{/n} «No tengo ni idea, Lord Capitán. En mi opinión, nuestros huérfanos viven mucho mejor de lo que lo harían en otras naves».
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

traits.locale_text: {n}El timonel se rasca la nuca, sumido en sus pensamientos.{/n} «No tenía ni idea, Lord Capitán. En mi opinión, nuestros huérfanos viven como reyes en comparación con lo que pasarían en otras naves».

languages.text: {n}雷沃若有所思地挠了挠后脑勺。{/n}“我哪知道这些事情，船长老大？不过要我说的话，我觉得，和别的船相比，我们这边的孤儿过得要好很多。”
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃若有所思地挠了挠后脑勺。{/n}“我哪知道这些事情，船长老大？不过要我说的话，我觉得，和其他船上的孤儿相比，我们这边的孤儿过得要好一些。”

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは考えにふけながら、後頭部をかきむしった。{/n}「どうなんでしょう、ロード・キャプテン。私が知っている限りでは、孤児たちは他の船に比べればかなりいい暮らしをしています」
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

traits.locale_text: {n}操舵士は考えにふけながら、後頭部をかきむしった。 {/n}「私が知っている限りですが、ロード・キャプテン。孤児たちは他の船に比べれば贅沢な暮らしをしています」

languages.text: {n}Der Steuermann kratzt sich nachdenklich am Hinterkopf.{/n} "Ich habe keinen Schimmer, Lord Captain. Wenn Ihr mich fragt, haben es unsere Waisen hier wesentlich besser, als auf anderen Schiffen."
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Steuermann kratzt sich nachdenklich am Hinterkopf.{/n} "Ich habe keinen Schimmer, Lord Captain. Wenn Ihr mich fragt, leben unsere Waisen im Schlaraffenland, wenn man es mal damit vergleicht, was sie auf anderen Schiffen bekommen würden."

languages.text: {n}Serdümen, düşünceli bir hâlde kafasının arkasını kaşıyor.{/n} "Biliyorsam ne olayım Lord Kaptan. Bana sorarsanız yetimlerimiz, diğer gemilere kıyasla çok daha iyi durumdalar."
languages.original_text: {n}The helmsman scratches the back of his head thoughtfully.{/n} "Damned if I know, Lord Captain. If you ask me, our orphans have it worlds better than they would on other ships."
